import TextBar from "../../components/TextBar"; import MainMenu from "../../components/MainMenu" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import "./AddUser.css" import {Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; function AddUser(){ const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; return( <>
{error && {error}} {message && {message}} {loading && }
Name Email address Password setPassword(e.target.value)} /> Confirm Password setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} /> {picMessage && ( {picMessage} )} Profile Picture postDetails(e.target.files[0])} id="custom-file" type="image/png" label="Upload Profile Picture" custom />
Have an Account ? Login
)} export default AddUser;
